text:
I shared my thoughts with the .@magnoliatribune on the Biden impeachment inquiry.

magnoliatribune.com/2023/09/…
Our prayers are with those in Florida and other states affected by Hurricane Idalia. Our neighbors are resilient when faced with natural disaster and they will recover.
We must continue to support Taiwan.

My staff attended the groundbreaking for the @Gluckstadt_MS Police Department and Municipal Court Building earlier this week. I’m proud to represent Gluckstadt and the exciting growth happening there.

After months of @HouseGOP uncovering a multitude of evidence against Hunter Biden, we now see DOJ finally appoint a special counsel in this matter. As hard as the President tried to cover up for his son, he has failed. Americans deserve to know the truth.

foxnews.com/us/ag-garland-ap…

.@WTOKTV .@NCHSCougars are doing impressive work readying the next generation for the workforce with Career and Technical Education. As a plus, NCHS is defending HS national cheer champion. I’m grateful for the opportunity to spend time on campus today.
Is there much more Mississippi than lunch at the Piggly Wiggly? I enjoyed visiting with old friends and meeting new ones in Collinsville.

I appreciate the update from Rep. Charles Young and Terry Dale Cruse about the incredible things going on @msstate - Meridian Campus. I am proud to have secured funding to expand the physician assistant program. MSU-Meridian continues to lead in healthcare.

The #PurpleHeart is awarded to service members wounded or killed by enemy action. George Washington commissioned this award in 1782 & it has been used to acknowledge bravery ever since. If you know a Purple Heart recipient, please thank them for their service.

I enjoyed visiting with officers at a Coffee with a Cop event this morning in Brandon. Our law enforcement officers risk their lives every day to keep our communities safe and I’m grateful for all they do.

Today, I met with the Mississippi Department of Banking and Consumer Finance to discuss the importance of local financial institutions to our communities. I’m thankful we have a staff of committed professionals to make sure our banks are in compliance with state regulations.

I’m proud to serve as Vice Chairman of @HomelandGOP where we are working hard to make America safer. My bill that passed this week is an important step in limiting China’s influence.

foxnews.com/politics/house-p…

I am proud that the @HouseAppropsGOP Milcon VA bill fully funds programs to care for our nation’s heroes & ensures that our military infrastructure needs are met. This bill focuses on the important work of these agencies while preventing the woke policies of Pres. Biden.

It was an honor to host Senator Tyler McCaughn and his nephew, Weston, in our Washington office today. We wish Weston the best as he heads to college this fall, and we are grateful to Senator McCaughn for his service in the Mississippi legislature.
I’m proud to join my colleagues in opposing a U. S. Fish and Wildlife Service proposed rule banning lead ammunition and fishing tackle. Thank you, @RepWesterman and @NatResources for your leadership.
This week, the President of Israel, Isaac Herzog, addressed Congress. In this joint meeting of Congress, the House and Senate came together in support of Israel.

I just hosted a teletownhall for constituents in the Third District. I enjoyed talking about issues we are facing as a state & nation, listening to input, & sharing about how my team can be of service. Be sure to subscribe to my weekly enewsletter at guest.house.gov.

I voted in favor of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). Providing for our nation’s defense is a top priority for @HouseGOP. The bill provides for the needs of servicemembers and their families while saving billions of taxpayer dollars by cracking down on waste.

The decision to close the investigation into the cocaine found at the White House is deeply disturbing. The lack of a thorough investigation is yet another example of a two-tiered justice system that only serves to further erode trust in our criminal justice process.

Today, the Supreme Court ruled that the government cannot dictate or diminish our beliefs. America’s greatest strength is our freedom.

foxnews.com/politics/supreme…

Training nurses is a central part of the @UMMCnews mission. I am thankful to have helped break ground for the new School of Nursing building, and am looking forward to seeing the building  serve as a new, modern training facility.

The Department of Justice announcement that Hunter Biden’s felony charges will be reduced reinforces a two-tiered criminal justice system in America. This administration has done more to undermine the public’s trust in our justice system than any in history.

It’s imperative that we recognize and support our law enforcement officers. I’m proud that my legislation to recognize police week has received bipartisan support and is set to pass the House of Representatives tonight.

washingtontimes.com/news/202…
Republicans delivered for the American people.

The Biden Administration is now incentivizing illegal immigration by releasing migrants into the U.S. without a court date to process their asylum claim. This is a free-for-all.

foxnews.com/politics/border-…

The American people spoke, & Republicans listened. As vice chairman of the Committee on Homeland Security I am proud to have cosponsored H.R. 2, a bill that takes a strong step towards securing our southern border. Republicans are leading the charge to end Biden’s Border Crisis.
Republicans are leading the fight to secure our border. It’s time to pass our comprehensive border bill to help end the crisis that has plagued our border for two years.

Republicans have fought for answers on how the Biden Admin will handle the surge at the border when Title 42 ends, but the Admin has not produced an effective plan. For 2 years, the President has made decisions that have created the worst immigration crisis in American history.

The Republican plan to secure our border would:

✅Finish the border wall
✅Enhance technology
✅Support law enforcement

These are common sense ideas that the Biden Admin has ignored or fought against for two years. It’s time to secure the border. 

guest.house.gov/media/press-…

The Biden Administration is either unwilling or unable to secure our border, so Republicans are leading the fight to cut off the cartel drug trade, end the immigration crisis, & support our border law enforcement. President Biden created this crisis, but Republicans will fix it.

Last year, Republicans made a Commitment to America to secure our nation and
protect the American people. My colleagues on the Committee on Homeland Security and I are delivering on our promise to secure our border by introducing the Border Reinforcement Act of 2023.

Every family has a budget, & the government should be no different. D.C. has a spending problem, & Republicans have introduced a plan to address our debt obligations while reining in excessive spending. This is fiscal responsibility that Americans deserve.
usatoday.com/story/opinion/c…

If we don’t act now, taxpayers will pay $10.5 trillion in interest payments alone over the next 10 years. 

This is not about left or right politics, it’s about fiscal responsibility that the American people deserve.

“Republicans made a Commitment to America last year to secure our borders and protect our communities. Today, we are delivering on our promise..." Read more about the Republican plan to take back our border from the cartels.
nypost.com/2023/04/23/house-…

For two years, the White House has fueled the worst border crisis in history. In just a few months in the majority, Republicans have introduced a comprehensive bill that would help take the steps necessary to provide a secure border for our nation. Watch to learn more:
April is Faith Month. I will be displaying the Christian flag to celebrate the importance of Faith in our state and our nation.

As Mississippians continue to struggle with record high prices, Tax Day can create significant hardship. That’s why I’m fighting against President Biden’s proposed tax increases and to lower the tax burden for hard-working Americans.
The Biden Administration has failed the American people.
Israel has the right to defend itself and its people from terrorism. I will continue to stand with our closest ally in the Middle East.

Republicans are focused on protecting our economic security, but Democrats continue to refuse to even consider any cuts to spending.  It’s time for President Biden to come to the table and work with us to reduce spending and to protect the American economy.

Stats, testimony, & common sense say otherwise, but Mayorkas continues to claim our border is secure. He believes the problem will go away if he ignores it, but Republicans are holding the Admin accountable for its failures & working on legislation to finally secure our border.

WATCH: Secretary Mayorkas continues to side step questions about the border even in the light of overwhelming evidence. We need real leadership. I’m working with my colleagues to deliver a real plan to address the border.
I’m proud to support the Lower Energy Costs Act to reduce the burden of gas and utility costs on hard working Americans. This is a strong first step in making our nation energy independent again.

My office remains in contact with the Gov’s office, FEMA, & MEMA to provide assistance where necessary in response to the storms that struck MS. The outpouring of support from across our state has been encouraging & reminds us of the spirit of service that makes our state unique.

This week, Congress will consider legislation to expand America’s energy production. We can make our nation energy independent again, which will strengthen our national security and bring down high costs.
Mississippi will pull through this disaster. I joined my colleagues to support Governor Reeves’s disaster declaration request to bring federal support to our great state.

Haley and I join our state in mourning the loss of our fellow Mississippians in last night’s weather. Please join us in prayer for the families and friends of those who perished or were injured in the storms.

President Biden's liberal agenda has cost Americans the greatest economy in history. 

Now, he is jeopardizing American investments. 

His veto of legislation to protect savings from woke ESG investments is wrong, & I encourage my colleagues to vote to overturn this veto.

The American Dream is built on the principle of hard-work. Liberal policies have supported unions compelling workers to join a union as a requirement for employment. I’m proud to cosponsor the National Right to Work Act to prohibit unions from requiring employees to join a union.

We have no idea who the cartels are smuggling through the border. The crisis has undermined our national security and our country is less secure as long as the Administration continues to fail to act.

ICYMI, I spoke with Gerard Gibert about my latest trip to the border and my continued efforts to work with law enforcement to secure our southwest border. Catch it here: @MidDaysGerard
piped.video/z9eeWBIqkso via @YouTube

The future for a Communist Honduras would be one without prosperity, rights, & liberties. By cozying up to China, @XiomaraCastroZ is endangering the future of her country, its relationship with the U.S., and, most importantly, the futures of the people who call Honduras home.

I’ve seen the devastating impact of fentanyl on families and communities in Mississippi. I’m working directly with border agents and my House colleagues to counter the Biden Administration’s policies that have led to the rise in fentanyl in our hometowns.
Secretary Mayorkas continues to lie about the state of our southern border. Operational control was lost under his watch, and it’s never been reestablished.
Open borders have led to a fentanyl crisis that has devastated communities across our nation. He must be held accountable for his inability and unwillingness to secure the border.

At least 1,000 migrants bombarded our border this weekend in an attempt to cross illegally. Unlike the Biden Administration, Republicans are not ignoring this crisis. I’m traveling to McAllen to meet with the CBP Chief to work on fixing this crisis.
The border is not secure. The Biden Administration has lied to the American people.

In his first 2 years, Pres Biden issued 107 Executive Orders that cost hardworking families over $1 trillion.

I voted in favor of the REIN IN Act to require the Admin to publish the inflationary impact of EOs so we can hold this Adminaccountable for the inflation crisis.
Free speech is the cornerstone of our Democracy. This week, Republicans passed legislation to protect that free speech from government censorship. The free flow of ideas must be protected.
WATCH: Republicans are prepared to address the border crisis with new legislation. If President Biden continues to ignore the crisis or block our legislation, the fallout will be solely on his hands.

This bill is a strong step forward in our mission to save as many lives as possible from this deadly drug, and we must continue to work with Customs and Border Protection to stop the flow of fentanyl into our communities.

The damage that has already been caused by fentanyl is irreparable, but we can act to mitigate the continued devastation that the drug is causing in communities across our nation. clarionledger.com/story/news…

Republicans are passing the REIN IN Inflation Act to bring accountability to the federal gov. The legislation would require the Biden Admin to publish the inflationary impact of executive orders so Americans can hold the admin accountable for its disastrous inflationary policies.

Tonight, I supported legislation to rescind Biden’s woke 401(k) EO, which allows fund managers to use your hard-earned dollars to prioritize a far-left agenda. This EO would trade future earnings to support the woke agenda, & Republicans took a step to protect the money you earn.
Arizona Sheriff Mark Lamb summed up what Republicans have been saying for almost two years: Every state is a border state in President Biden’s border crisis.
Not all border agents are human. K-9 units are a critical part in the fight to secure our border. I had the chance to thank this K-9, Billy, for the great job he and his handler are doing.

Our border is not secure. Since Pres Biden took office, more than 4,500,000 immigrants have illegally entered the country. I’m helping lead a group of my colleagues from @HomelandGOP on a trip to speak directly to the men & women who are on the front lines of this crisis.

REMINDER: Over 60 percent of Americans think President Biden has accomplished “little or nothing” in his presidency. 

Republicans in Congress are working towards the wins the American people want and deserve. 

washingtonpost.com/politics/…

ICYMI: I spoke with Frank Corder with the Magnolia Tribune about some of the most important issues we plan to tackle in Congress, like securing our border, national security following the Chinese spy balloon, and reining in government spending.

The CCP is actively violating our airspace to gather military intelligence. 

It's amazing that the VP is suggesting that this would not affect our diplomatic relationship. 

Since the Admin is unwilling to hold China accountable, they must fully brief Congress so that we can.

Over 1 million migrants have crossed our border and evaded arrest.

I introduced legislation last Congress that provides local law enforcement agencies with the resources they need to assist in this growing crisis.

Republicans will continue to deliver on our Commitment to America. In just over a month, we’ve: 

✔ Voted to defund 87,000 IRS agents
✔ Established the bipartisan China Select Committee
✔ Restored transparency in the House

Our work is just beginning.

Today the house passed legislation that I co-sponsored to assure that only citizens can vote in local DC elections.  Voting is a duty of American citizens that must be protected. I am proud to join my fellow conservatives to defend our democracy from the radical woke agenda.

In our first month in the majority, Republicans have delivered important wins for the American people: 

✔ Defunded 87,000 IRS agents
✔ Established the bipartisan China Select Committee
✔ Restored transparency in the House

Crime is rampant, overdose deaths are at historic levels, inflation is hurting American pocket books, and our border remains open. America is strong, but under the policies of this Administration, the state of our union is not.
During the worst immigration crisis in our nation’s history, the President has been largely silent except in instances when he criticized our hard-working officers on the border.
Over half of Americans rate the economy as “bad” under President Biden. #sotu2023
The misnamed “Inflation Reduction Act” did nothing to combat inflation. It only increased government spending by $745 billion, which only put us in further inflationary jeopardy.  #sotu2023

President Biden used our Strategic Petroleum Reserve as a political tool to address high gas prices. Instead of using our emergency reserves, the President could have ended his attacks on American energy like oil and natural gas to bring down costs. #sotu2023

A poll by ABC News and the Washington post show that more Americans say they are worse off financially than they were before President Biden took office — the highest in the poll’s history.  #SOTU
abcnews.go.com/Politics/reco…

Issues the President should address tonight:

❎His classified documents
❎The border crisis
❎Inflationary spending under this Administration
❎The high levels of crime

These issues matter to the American people.

When President Biden took office, inflation stood at 1.4%. Inflation now stands at a rate four times higher than it was in January 2021. In his address to the nation tonight, the President must accept his Administration’s responsibility in creating this inflation crisis.

During the worst immigration crisis in our nation’s history, the President has been largely silent except in instances when he criticized our hard-working officers on the border. That must change tonight. The President must commit to working with Republicans to secure our border.

The Chinese spy balloon was a foreign aircraft that was allowed to fly over 21 US military installations at a height where it could surveil significant military assets. When faced with a decision to defend American assets from espionage, Pres Biden flinched.

We must combat the Chinese Communist Party’s encroachment into our nation. I’m proud to join this effort to root out CCP propaganda in American institutions. 
foxnews.com/politics/house-g…
It’s simple: parents should have a voice in what their children are taught in school.
Every American has to set a budget, and that includes cutting wasteful or unnecessary spending in our personal lives. Republicans are holding the federal government to the same standard.
President Reagan would have blown the Chinese spy balloon out of the sky. Biden is clearly no Ronald Reagan.

No argument can justify the disasters and deaths that were caused by Socialist ideologies. Today, the House officially recognized the horrors of socialism to reaffirm our commitment to democracy and capitalism.

Sharon Johnson has worked tirelessly for MS-03 for 35 years, starting with G.V. Sonny Montgomery & working for every Third District Representative since. I’m thankful every day for her service & insight, & it was an honor to recognize her service to our state on the House floor.
That’s why I’m supporting the SHOW UP Act, which would reinstate pre-pandemic telework policies in the federal government.

Government agencies have been slow to respond to the critical needs of constituents, including delays in IRS and Social Security cases. It’s time for federal government employees to return to in-office work so we can ensure that constituents are receiving the services they need.

Examples of President Biden abusing the Public Health Emergency:

❌Open Southern Border
❌Vaccine Mandates
❌Mask Mandates
❌Debt Forgiveness

Tonight, House Republicans will begin to reign in the President’s overreach by voting to end the Public Health Emergency.

We have made great strides in combatting COVID-19, & it’s clear that the COVID-19 pandemic is over. It’s time to end the Public Health Emergency.  That’s why I'm supporting legislation this week to end the emergency, reopen our federal government, & return people back to work.

Alan Loving has been an inspiration to so many people in our Mississippi community. We will continue to stand with him during his time of difficulty, and we are continuously praying for him and his family.

President Biden’s policies have crippled American energy security. Today, House Republicans passed legislation that would refill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve and strengthen our nation’s energy independence.

Since President Biden took office a little over two years ago, we know of over 1.2 million migrants who have evaded border patrol agents. This Administration must be held accountable for its incompetence.

Great work by Sheriff Bryan Bailey and @Bramlett_DA  on stopping these dangerous drugs from entering our community. MS will continue to be impacted by Pres Biden’s border crisis until his Admin comes to the table with Republicans and gets serious about securing our border.
I will continue to defend the unalienable Right to Life.

The Strategic Petroleum Reserve is not a political tool for President Biden to flip on and off to cover his disastrous energy policies. Republicans will pass legislation this week to open up drilling to refill the SPR when misused for political gain.
Border agents have already encountered 38 people on the terrorist watchlist in the first three months of FY23. President Biden’s border policies have failed. Accountability is coming.

It’s necessary that the People’s House maintain the ethical standards of the people who elected us. I’m honored to lead the committee that will maintain the level of integrity that the American people expect from their Representatives.
Mississippians deserve truth and transparency from the federal government.

One of the first bills we passed in the House this year was to recognize the terrible crimes committed against Pro-Life institutions. The FBI is now acting to bring these criminals to justice.

foxnews.com/politics/fbi-off…

I’m honored to be recognized by Susan B. Anthony Pro-Life America for my A+ rating to defend unborn life. I will continue to promote pro-life legislation and be a voice for the unborn through my work in Congress. #DefendLife
I’m honored to continue to serve on @HomelandGOP

I’m honored to be selected to serve on the House Appropriations Committee, and I’m grateful for this new opportunity to serve the people of Mississippi and to tackle the pressing issues facing our nation.

For a year, the Biden Admin & Congressional Democrats remained silent on the attacks on pro-life organizations. That changed today when the Republican-led House officially condemned the violent acts of extremists against churches, pro-life institutions & crisis pregnancy centers.
Change is coming.
It’s Law Enforcement Appreciation Day. I hope you’ll join me in thanking our brave law enforcement officers for the hard work they do every day to keep our communities safe.

President Biden has caused the worst crisis we have ever seen on our southern border. Unless he works with Republicans to fix the problem his trip is nothing more than a photo op. Americans deserve a secure border.

foxnews.com/politics/us-saw-…
It’s time to get to work in the new, Republican-led House of Representatives with a new, conservative Speaker. I’m ready to work with Speaker McCarthy to get America back on track.
.@billclarkphotos caught this moment today on the floor. I hope you will join Reps. Higgins, Ezell, and me in praying for the future of our nation.

The American people elected us to secure the border, defund the Democrats’ army of IRS agents & to hold the Biden Admin accountable. We cannot begin to do these important tasks until we elect a Speaker. Every day without a Republican Speaker is a win for liberal Democrats.
Every day Republicans disagree among ourselves is a win for the Democrats. We must come together to select a Speaker so we can begin to work for the American people.
Great win today, Bulldogs! Coach Leach would be proud. #HailState
A great tribute to a great leader and coach. Swing your sword today, Dawgs. Good luck and #HailState
